import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./MenuPage.css"; import APIService from "../../Services/APIService"; function MenuPage() { const [cakes, setCakes] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { async function fetchCakes() { try { const cakesData = await APIService.getAll(); setCakes(cakesData); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching cakes:", error); } } fetchCakes(); }, []); function takeIdOfCake(CakeId) { const CakeInfo = APIService.getCakebyId(CakeId); } return (

    • pavlova

  • Mochi
{cakes.map((cake) => (
takeIdOfCake(cake.id)} > {/* Existing cake card content */}
))}
{/* Display CakeInfoModal when a cake is selected */} {selectedCake && ( setSelectedCake(null)} /> )}
); } export default MenuPage;
